messages.messageBody:

> Subject: Re: Digest Number 1834
>
> Diana~ where can you get a GED study guide?? my kids are still young
> ...but i
> like to see the future~ HAHA pun intended~ DEnise
>
>

We bought one at Border's. Rachel still hasn't decided if she will take
the test or not, but the study guide is a concise was of seeing what is
supposed to be covered in public high school, if you are curious, or your
child wants to know.


Bridget
